name: video-quickstart-js
description: Twilio Video SDK Quick Start for JavaScript

scripts.build:examples:bandwidthconstraints: copyfiles -f examples/bandwidthconstraints/public/* public/examples/bandwidthconstraints && copyfiles -f examples/bandwidthconstraints/src/helpers.js public/examples/bandwidthconstraints && browserify examples/bandwidthconstraints/src/index.js > public/examples/bandwidthconstraints/index.js
scripts.build:examples:codecpreferences: copyfiles -f examples/codecpreferences/public/* public/examples/codecpreferences && copyfiles -f examples/codecpreferences/src/helpers.js public/examples/codecpreferences && browserify examples/codecpreferences/src/index.js > public/examples/codecpreferences/index.js
scripts.build:examples:dominantspeaker: copyfiles -f examples/dominantspeaker/public/* public/examples/dominantspeaker && copyfiles -f examples/dominantspeaker/src/helpers.js public/examples/dominantspeaker && browserify examples/dominantspeaker/src/index.js > public/examples/dominantspeaker/index.js
scripts.build:examples:localvideofilter: copyfiles -f examples/localvideofilter/public/* public/examples/localvideofilter && copyfiles -f examples/localvideofilter/src/helpers.js public/examples/localvideofilter && browserify examples/localvideofilter/src/index.js > public/examples/localvideofilter/index.js
scripts.build:examples:localvideosnapshot: copyfiles -f examples/localvideosnapshot/public/* public/examples/localvideosnapshot && copyfiles -f examples/localvideosnapshot/src/helpers.js public/examples/localvideosnapshot && browserify examples/localvideosnapshot/src/index.js > public/examples/localvideosnapshot/index.js
scripts.build:examples:mediadevices: copyfiles -f examples/mediadevices/public/* public/examples/mediadevices && copyfiles -f examples/mediadevices/src/helpers.js public/examples/mediadevices && browserify examples/mediadevices/src/index.js > public/examples/mediadevices/index.js
scripts.build:examples:networkquality: copyfiles -f examples/networkquality/public/* public/examples/networkquality && copyfiles -f examples/networkquality/src/helpers.js public/examples/networkquality && browserify examples/networkquality/src/index.js > public/examples/networkquality/index.js
scripts.build:examples:reconnection: copyfiles -f examples/reconnection/public/* public/examples/reconnection && copyfiles -f examples/reconnection/src/helpers.js public/examples/reconnection && browserify examples/reconnection/src/index.js > public/examples/reconnection/index.js
scripts.build:examples:screenshare: copyfiles -f examples/screenshare/public/* public/examples/screenshare && copyfiles -f examples/screenshare/src/helpers.js public/examples/screenshare && browserify examples/screenshare/src/index.js > public/examples/screenshare/index.js
scripts.build:examples:localmediacontrols: copyfiles -f examples/localmediacontrols/public/* public/examples/localmediacontrols && copyfiles -f examples/localmediacontrols/src/helpers.js public/examples/localmediacontrols && browserify examples/localmediacontrols/src/index.js > public/examples/localmediacontrols/index.js
scripts.build:examples:remotereconnection: copyfiles -f examples/remotereconnection/public/* public/examples/remotereconnection && copyfiles -f examples/remotereconnection/src/helpers.js public/examples/remotereconnection && browserify examples/remotereconnection/src/index.js > public/examples/remotereconnection/index.js
scripts.build:quickstart: copyfiles -f quickstart/public/* public/quickstart && browserify quickstart/src/index.js > public/index.js && copyfiles -f public/index.js public/quickstart/index.js
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && node server

author: Twilio
